column2: "Dɛm ntsi mebɛyɛ Samaria dɛ hamu abokuw
column3: na dɛ wenyin ture ntsetsɛweebea: na mubohue n'abo no egu bɔnsa no mu
column4: na meyi ne fapem ato gua."

column3: na wɔdze gya ahyew n'apɛdze nyina
column4: na mayɛ n'abosom nyina afoafo: osiandɛ edwaman apɛdze na ɔdze aboa ano
column5: na edwaman apɛdze na ɔbɛsan akɛyɛ."

column2: "Na n'epirakur ayɛ koannkɔ: na oebodu Juda; oebodu me man abobokɛse ano

column3: mma hom nnsu koraa: Bɛt-leafra na hom mfa homho mpirepirew huntuma mu."
twa mu kɔ wɔ adagyaw na enyito mu oo: Zaanan ɔtsefo mmpuei mmbae. Bɛt-ezel ewuotwa bɛma hom egyinae abɔ hom."

column2: "Na Marot ɔtsefo rotweɔn mber pa ahomtsew mu: osiandɛ mbusu fi EWURADZE hɔ aba Jerusalɛm abobokɛse mu."

column3: fa tseaseanam no se pɔnkɔ ɔhoɔharfo no oo: ɔno nye Zion babaa no bɔn ahyɛse; osiandɛ wohun Israel mbrato no wɔ wo mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ebɛma Moresɛt-gat nkradzi akyɛdze: Akizib efi bɛyɛ ndaadaadze ama Israel ahemfo."

column3: medze nyia ɔbɛfa wo ayɛ enyadze no bɛba wo do oo: Israel enyimnyam bɛba araa ebodu Adullam."
na yi wo ho nhwi wɔ mba a edɔ hɔn ntsi: ma w'etsipaa ntserɛw dɛ ɔpɛtɛkwaakye dze; osiandɛ ɔafa hɔn efi wo nkyɛn kɔ ndɔmmum."
